## PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp.unstakeMP() method

Withdraw MP from staking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeMP(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: BitcoinsTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of MP to withdraw. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedbitcoinsmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the MP stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) and [BPD gain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md)<!-- -->.
